Posts.Content: Hi I had my 1st cycle of chemo TCHP  I'm now on day 9 and have started with bad back and the odd few tight chest pains? Is this just a side affect or could my BC spread?  Please any help would be appreciated  Sam xx
Posts.Title: Pain after 1st cycle of chemo? HELP

Posts.Content: Hello I was taken into hospital last Monday 4 days after chemo due to catching a sickness bug that half of my family had,while there my heart rate was 130 but did drop after a while,I was constantly being sick due to the bug..it lasted 7days..Doctor said I was fine to go home after 6hrs but said my liver bloods were high? This was the case last time after 1st case of chemo so my chemo drug was reduced by 20% but no the doctor from the hospital has referred me to have a ultrasound for my liver? Any1 has this I'm so worried they think the cancer has spread but not said! Not sure if my oncologist knows I've been sent for this ultrasound as it was the hospital doctor that has done it!  Just feeling abit worried,I've just been coming round to haveing BC and getting on with chemo n life!  Thanks sam xx
Posts.Title: * * * December Breast Cancer Chemo Club * * *

Posts.Content: Hello lady’s my BCN has been off poorly and not spoke to her since I had my Lumpectomy and results after surgery 6 weeks ago...she rang me Friday asking how I was coping and to say well done on the good results and she’s pleased I had no vascular invasion? I don’t want to google as I panic with some stuff I see or read! Anybody no what that means? I’m presuming it’s good... Thanks Sam x

Posts.Content: Evening lady’s been to see my oncologist today I asked her to check my boob as the scar tissue feels very lumpy she said it’s normal but found a little cyst like lump while feeling about she said she will send me for an ultrasound incase it’s a fibroadenoma but she said not to worry as she’s not worried I can’t help but worry now surely if it’s anything like a cyst or worse it would of shown up 3weeks ago when I had mammogram and ultrasound 2hrs b4 surgery? Help plz I’m hoping it’s down to surgery but i will contact my BCN tomorrow....

Posts.Content: I'm dreading the T and C today!  Fingers crossed I'm not as bad as last night off H and P xx
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: Had my 1st cycle of chemo and ended up in hospital! I'm ok now!! but my oncologist came to see me and said the 1st cycle of chemo has showed affect to my liver and will be checked before next chemo... What will happen if I can't carry on with treatment I'm scared!!!
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: Morning Lady P  I had an ok 1 st night after chemo,didn't sleep much tho woke up with a little headache,but all good now I've taken all my meds,I'm going to nip to get some ice cream incase... Then it's back home for a sofa day the joys of being off work for 4 months xx Sam x
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: My 1st chemo session went well,Cold cap was ok after 20min did want to take it off after 10min but got better I'm home now shower n pjs,got my bag of tablets and box of injections for nurse to do xx 1 down 5 to go xxx
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: HI lady P Im doing ok day 3 slept 11hrs last night waking up for 10min only (yay)  Mouths still very weird when eating and drinking can only seem to like milk,can't eat much tho as I'm not hungry but will try cereal today,feel abit sick from time to time but tablets work for that Just need to wait now for district nurse to come and give me my injection today xx  Hope ur well xxx
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: Thanks sabadee  I had the Herceptin and pejerta yesterday came home with migraine and bein sick,but I suffer with migraines and the to be honest the hospital lights didn't help!  Chemo today at 11 I will let you no how I get on Sam xx
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: Hi jo  Had Herceptin and pejerta through iv yesterday,was fine till I got home suffered a migraine so was being sick most of the evening ( I suffer migraines anyway ) also the hospital lights don't help...wa sat there 6 hrs as they lost my drugs in transit and had to wait 3hrs for them to arrive 1st chemo today at 11am hopeing it's kind to me haha How you feeling now Jo? Xx
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: Hi jacks77  I'm Sam age 34 diagnosed 1st September 2017 I have the exact same cancer as you! Started chemo and therapy treatment 4th October then will have surgery lumpectomy and 1 lymph node removed!   Just been to see my oncologist fo check up and blood tests ready for chemo again Thursday!! GOOD NEWS my tumour has shrunk massively off 1 round of chemo she's very pleased and hoping I only need another 2 rounds after this 1 instead of 4 ! This is how well the treatment works  I was a worrier but now I can the light at the end of the tunnel Good Luck  Sam xx

I'm still waiting to see about chemo and op that's another 2weeks away but hopefully once I know when and what treatment I will be getting I think I will be able move forward,Good Luck Sam x

Posts.Title: Perjeta

Posts.Content: Hi I'm Sam I'm 34 I was diagnosed with Invasive ductal carcinoma Stage 1 grade 3 the tumour is 3cm with 1 lymph node affected...HER2 and Er postive...classed as aggressive also...I didn't no treatment plan for a month that is the most worrying time! I'm now on my 3rd cycle of chemo tomorrow and then lumpectomy....I've not had any scans ect not sure why! And I'm not sure about your daughters cancer have you any more info? As I wouldn't like to Google as that's the worse thing to do! I'm sure some1 will be along soon to help you more... Thinking of u and your daughter xx
Posts.Title: So scared

Posts.Content: Thanks my  ultrasound is the 14th December so hopefully will be enjoying Christmas if results are good  Will keep you updated x
Posts.Title: Rang BC nurse about ultrasound

Posts.Content: Hello this is strange for me as I was diagnosed 1st September with Her2+ Grade 3 IDC But today I’ve woken up feeling very down... I’ve been positive through it all up to yet!  I’m on my last cycle of TCHP Chemo Thursday then Lumpectomy in Feb with 1 affected node removal then radiotherapy! I just keep thinking that my stage of the cancer is higher then what my BC nurse said, how she no it’s stage 1 off a mammogram,ultrasound and biopsy?? Other people have said they won’t no till after surgery! I’ve had a liver and kidney biopsy no spread to them ( happy about that ) but feeling very scared today....not ready to leave my family especially my partner and 15 yr old daughter   I’m only 34 is this just a blip in life and will I always have bad days like this? Plz help  Thanks Sam
Posts.Title: Any Her2+ grade 3 IDC ( having a bad day today )

Posts.Content: What was the pain like after lymph node removal? Ive heard we have a drain fitted for a few days? X
Posts.Title: Any Her2+ grade 3 IDC ( having a bad day today )

Posts.Content: Hello everyone I posted on here the other day regarding a letter being received from hospital after being admitted due to catching a bug!  Bloods for liver came back high which I had this problem after 1st cycle of chemo so my oncologist reduced my chemo 20% as I'm on HPTC  So I received a letter to be sent for an ultrasound on my abdomen and pelvis to check my liver by the hospital!  My diagnosis is Stage 1 maybe 2 as 1 lymph node is affected Grade 3 invasive ductal carcinoma 3cm tumour! Chemo has shrunk to tumour a lot after 3 cycles !  I rang my BC nurse to ask why I have been sent for this ultrasound as I'm very worried,she looked it up on computer and said it's just procedure the hospital have seen high blood results and just automatically referred me! She said it's nothing to worry about but why am I worrying? My 4th cycle out of 6 is tomorrow and I'm just getting to live with the fact that I have BC and hopefully will be cured...but this has own set me back and I'm thinking the worse ( has it spread ) would they know from the 1st bloods they take before cycle 1 if there was any signs of spread ( cancer ) It's really getting me down!  Sorry for the long post but I want to look forward to Christmas with my partner 15yr old daughter and family  Please help thanks sam xx
Posts.Title: Rang BC nurse about ultrasound

Posts.Content: I went for my 1st radiotherapy appointment yesterday,and my oncologist said I would be having 15 sessions of radiotherapy 3weeks! But when I went to my appointment yesterday I was told I will have 15 sessions plus another 8 boosters to focus on were the tumour was! Has any1 else had this thanks Sam
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy boosters?

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone he did mention about me being young lol 34 x
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy boosters?

Posts.Content: Thanks everyone I will have what ever is offered to me to keep the beast away...I’d never heard of boosters until my appointment so reason for asking,glad I’m not the only 1 xx

Posts.Content: Hi I'm starting chemo Wednesday and I'm getting really scared..... What if it don't work? What if I'm really poorly through it,I have a 15yr old daughter and don't want her worrying... After chemo I will have my surgery x

Posts.Title: Neo adjuvant chemotherapy, midway scan

Posts.Content: Hi everyone,I saw my sergeon yesterday he filled me in on what's going to be happening! 6 sessions of chemo over 18weeks,Then lumpectomy and lymph node removal,Then Radiotherapy,then a year of injections 1 a month followed by 10years on tablets? This sound normal? I have Invasive ductal carcinoma breast cancer 3cm lump in right breast! Breast nurse said Stage 1 Grade 3 ( aggressive)  I'm also worrying now that it could of spread knowing my underarm lymph node is affected,surely they should be giving me more tests or scans to see? All I'm having now before I see oncologist is Heart scan as I'm HER2 positive and a clip inserted to my breast as I'm having chemo before surgery ( so lump might shrink ) I can't contact anyone as breast nurses arnt available till Monday! I'm so scared overthinking again...has anyone else had a node affected and not had scans and it's not spread? Surely they must no by results?? Help please!!!! Sorry to keep posting and asking questions                              Sam xx
Posts.Title: Lymph node affected help needed please?

Posts.Content: Thankyou all so much xx
Posts.Title: ER+ and HER2+

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer 2weeks ago at age 34,My breast nurse said it's stage 1 Grade 3 Er+ and HER2+ with 1 affected lymph node underarm! I was having a lumpectomy 2nd October then chemo,my nurse rang me to say my sergeon wants to see me next Friday ( 15th ) to discuss Chemo 1st now then operation,I'm feeling abit worried as it's been 4weeks since finding the lump and my oncologist appointment isn't till the 26th September and I keep thinking that what if it spreading while I'm waiting about...I just want treatment to start so I can get better! Is HER2+ bad?
Posts.Title: ER+ and HER2+

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reassurance my mind likes doing this..like I have said hopefully once treatment starts I'll start to live again and feel ok,the waiting is horrible x
Posts.Title: ER+ and HER2+

Posts.Content: Thanks R,I get my head around 1 thing then something else pops up! Like HER2 positive which I am will it return will I be living in fear? Has it spread with being Grade 3 aggressive? How do they no im stage 1? ( surely can't tell me that if they don't no ) has my lymph node caught the cancer from spreading? This it what goes through my head! Plus will my 15 yr old daughter suffer have I given it her? So upsetting and just want to start my treatment now! That's past 2weeks have been the longest ever x

Posts.Content: Evening lady’s ☺️ ok a couple of questions today I’ve just been to see my oncologist as a follow up with my Herceptin! ( they talk that fast and in weird language I don’t understand her ) As you no I put on here that my period had started 1st time since diagnosis in September 2017 so she’s said as my BC was hormone fed Er and her2 positive that she thinks it’s best to start having the Zoladex injection every 28days for 2yrs plus my Tamoxifen any1 have this? Also she added in there that it would be best to take this injection as I’m High Risk? Does she mean in recurrence? As I know I was Grade 3? Sorry but just need my little mind putting at ease  Thanks Sam

Letter also says this doesn’t affect my treatment or prognosis....Any1 else had this I’m very worried x

Posts.Title: Need some1 to talk please

Posts.Content: Hi everyone just need someone to talk to and keep my sane,this cancer I have I doing my head in I know a lot of people have the same but I'm still worried,I'm not ready to go anywhere yet,I'm so scared that I am....I've got invasive ductal carcinoma HER2+ and 1 affected lymph node,not even seen oncologist yet 26th September Im there! I just want it gone and be normal again ( if that will ever happen ) please help xx I feel utter crap and scared xx no1 should have to face this I'm 34 and want to live my life away from Fear xx
Posts.Title: Need some1 to talk please

Posts.Content: Thanks I was diagnosed 1st September I have a fab family and partner that's there for me to,I have a 15yr old daughter that has taken it brilliantly but I have told her I'm not going anywhere,but I don't want to her thinking I am! The waiting is horrible,I'm waiting to see oncologist for chemo to start but need a heart scan 1st them will Ben having op after chemo I'm having lumpectomy and lymph node removed xx

Grade 3 is aggressive so that's making me think more! I'm sure if it was that bad they would have me being checked via MRI or CT? X
